author: Kate Cornell
description:

It’s a tale as old as time. Much like that meeting should have been an email that I only just skimmed through, Karine Jean-Pierre’s book Independent should have been an one-and-a-half page article for National Review or Vox or The New Yorker that got lost in the post-election shuffle.

But, no.

The first black lesbian person to ever do something or other had to be trotted out on every Leftist media outlet like The View. CBS Mornings. The Late Show. PBS NewsHour. NPR. The Weekend: Primetime. The Bulwark.

To name a few.
